briefTitle: Oral Sulopenem Versus Amoxicillin/Clavulanate for Uncomplicated Urinary Tract Infection in Adult Women
officialTitle: A Prospective, Phase 3, Randomized, Multi-center, Double-blind Study of the Efficacy, Tolerability, and Safety of Oral Sulopenem Etzadroxil/Probenecid Versus Oral Amoxicillin/Clavulanate for Treatment of Uncomplicated Urinary Tract Infections (uUTI) in Adult Women
summary: Study 310 is a clinical study which compares the effectiveness of oral sulopenem versus oral amoxicillin/clavulanate for the treatment of adult women with uncomplicated urinary tract infection.
